trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for types that represent a panel item on a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe base para tipos que representam um item do painel no painel de etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerActionItem class serves as an abstract base for classes that represent individual panel items in a smart tag panel, which represents a menu-like user interface (UI) for smart tags.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DesignerActionItem serve como um abstrato base para classes que representam os itens do painel individuais no painel de etiquetas inteligentes, que representa uma interface de utilizador como o menu (IU) para etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] supplies derived classes that represent the different common entries in a smart tag panel, including plain text, header text, properties and methods of the associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class, and designer verbs.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] derivam de fontes de classes que representam as entradas comuns diferentes no painel de etiquetas inteligentes, incluindo texto simples, o texto do cabeçalho, propriedades e métodos de associada <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>classe e verbos estruturador.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: Typically, your `DesignerAction` feature is defined in a programmer-supplied class derived from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>, which contains a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method that groups individual panel items together to form the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o `DesignerAction` funcionalidade está definida numa classe fornecido pelo programador derivada <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>, que contém um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>método que grupos de itens do painel individuais para formar o painel de etiquetas inteligentes.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> types are associated with members of the class derived from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> objects are activated when their associated panel entry is selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>tipos estão associados a membros de classe derivada de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>objetos são ativados quando a respetiva entrada de painel associado está selecionada pelo utilizador.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Forms and dialog boxes can be displayed by members of the class derived from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Formulários e caixas de diálogo podem ser apresentadas por membros da classe derivada de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: By default, the parent of these windows will be the container window for the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o principal destas janelas será a janela de contentor para o painel de etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: Explicitly parenting these child windows to another service or window may cause items to display improperly.
trans-unit.target: Explicitamente parenting estas janelas subordinadas para outro serviço ou janela pode fazer com que os itens a apresentar incorretamente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> is an abstract class, the DesignerActionItem constructor is intended to be called from derived classes only.
trans-unit.target: Porque <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>é uma classe abstracta, DesignerActionItem construtor se destina a ser chamado a partir apenas as classes derivadas.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the `category` parameter is used to group items on a panel, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como o `category` parâmetro é utilizado para agrupar itens no painel de um, consulte o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The panel text for this item.
trans-unit.target: O texto do painel para este item.

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive <xref:System.String> that defines the groupings of panel entries.
trans-unit.target: As maiúsculas e minúsculas <xref:System.String>que define os agrupamentos de entradas de painel.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Supplemental text for this item, potentially used in ToolTips or the status bar.
trans-unit.target: Texto suplementar para este item, podendo ser utilizado descrições ou a barra de estado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to allow this item to be placed into a group of items that have the same <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category*> property value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se pretende permitir que este item para ser colocado num grupo de itens com o mesmo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category*>valor da propriedade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category*>

trans-unit.source: Because multiple <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects may be combined to form a single smart tag panel, the AllowAssociate property indicates whether the current item can be rearranged by category.
trans-unit.target: Porque vários <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objetos podem ser combinados para formar um painel único de etiquetas inteligentes, a propriedade AllowAssociate indica se o item atual pode ser reorganizar por categoria.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: The AllowAssociate property is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.RelatedComponent%2A> property on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem> types.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AllowAssociate é utilizada em conjunto com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.RelatedComponent%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem>tipos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.RelatedComponent%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, ASP.NET uses a data-bound control like <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> to connect to a data source control like <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o ASP.NET utiliza um controlo vinculado a dados como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>ligar a um controlo de origem de dados como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Both have a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> with its own set of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Têm um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>com o seu próprio conjunto de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>objetos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has items like <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>, `Edit Fields`, and `AutoFormat`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo tem itens como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>, `Edit Fields`, e `AutoFormat`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> class has `Configure` and `Refresh Items`, which have AllowAssociate set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>classe tem `Configure` e `Refresh Items`, que tem AllowAssociate definido como `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> item has a related component, which is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>item tem um componente relacionado, o que é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: All the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> object's items that have AllowAssociate set to `true` are automatically included in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control's action list.
trans-unit.target: Todos os o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>itens do objeto que tenham AllowAssociate definido como `true` são automaticamente incluídos no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>lista de ação do controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how the two lists are merged in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control's designer action list.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra como as duas listas são intercaladas no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>lista de ação estruturador do controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: |GridView items|SqlDataSource items| |--------------------|-------------------------| |- `DataSourceID` (related component = `SqlDataSource`)
trans-unit.target: | Itens de GridView | Itens de SqlDataSource | |--------------------|-------------------------| |- `DataSourceID` (componente relacionado = `SqlDataSource`)

trans-unit.source: - Edit Fields
trans-unit.target: -Editar campos

trans-unit.source: - AutoFormat|- Configure (`AllowAssociate` = `true`)
trans-unit.target: -AutoFormat |-configurar (`AllowAssociate` = `true`)

trans-unit.source: - Refresh (`AllowAssociate` = `true`)| |Merged GridView control's smart tasks panel| |-------------------------------------------------| |- DataSourceID
trans-unit.target: - Refresh (`AllowAssociate` = `true`)| | Intercalar o painel de tarefas inteligente do controlo de GridView | |-------------------------------------------------| |-DataSourceID

trans-unit.source: - Configure
trans-unit.target: -Configurar

trans-unit.source: - Refresh
trans-unit.target: -Atualização

trans-unit.source: - Edit Fields
trans-unit.target: -Editar campos

trans-unit.source: - AutoFormat|
trans-unit.target: -AutoFormat |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item can be grouped; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o item pode ser agrupado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the group name for an item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do grupo de um item.

trans-unit.source: Item categories are defined by their names, which are case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Categorias de item são definidas pelos respetivos nomes, que são maiúsculas e minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how items are grouped by category, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como os itens estão agrupados por categoria, consulte o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the group that the item is a member of.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa o grupo de que o item é um membro.

trans-unit.source: Gets the supplemental text for the item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto suplementar para o item.

trans-unit.source: The Description property is used whenever a plain text description of the item is required (for example, in ToolTips and the status bar).
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Description é utilizada sempre que é necessária uma descrição de texto simples do item (por exemplo, na barra de estado e descrições).

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is set in the constructor for this class.
trans-unit.target: O valor desta propriedade é definido no construtor para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the descriptive text for the item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o texto descritivo para o item.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the text for this item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto para este item.

trans-unit.source: The value of the DisplayName property is set in the constructor for this class.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade DisplayName está definido no construtor para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the display text for the item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o texto apresentado para o item.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection that can be used to store programmer-defined key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência a uma coleção que pode ser utilizada para armazenar pares chave/valor definido pelo programador.

trans-unit.source: The Properties property allows the programmer to store arbitrary data within an item.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade propriedades permite que o programador armazenar dados arbitrários dentro de um item.

trans-unit.source: The standard properties for this class, such as <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.DisplayName%2A>, are not stored in this collection.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades para este padrão de classe, tal como <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.DisplayName%2A>, não são armazenadas nesta coleção.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.DisplayName%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type of this property is actually <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo desta propriedade é realmente <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A collection that implements <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que implementa <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this item appears in source code view.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se este item é apresentado na vista de código de origem.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this item appears in source code view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este item é apresentado na vista de código de origem; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
